info.name: Nocturnal DeviantArt Theme
info.description:
Definitely still a WIP. 
Dark theme for the nocturnal users of DA!
info.additionalInfo:
01.09.17 - Fixed lots of issues.
13.08.17 - Fixed issues with different modules on profiles.
25.06.17 - Fixed forum issues.
26.7.16 - Themed comment bg in notifications.
04.5.16 - Fixed white/green parts, fixed edit button not showing, small changes.
27.4.16 - Fixed search bar text profile bar bg.
19.4.16 - Finished submit and other pages.
13.4.16 - Initial release.

data.title: Still bits of green and white
